title: Both sub-ambient and above-ambient conditions: a comprehensive approach for efficient use of radiative cooling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

In real-world radiative cooling applications, cooling surface temperatures may periodically fluctuate between sub- and above-ambient conditions. Traditional radiative cooling surface with ‘static’ spectral properties cannot realize high efficiency cooling due...
